abstract: Finnish media company Sanoma announces that it will sell its stake in Vedomosti, Russia's most influential business newspaper and well as ownership of The Moscow Times to Demyan Kudryavtsev, veteran Russian media manager.
lead_paragraph: A Finnish media company said it would sell its stake in Vedomosti, Russia’s most influential business newspaper, as well as ownership of The Moscow Times.

headline.main: New Owner for The Moscow Times and Vedomosti

snippet: A Finnish media company said it would sell its stake in Vedomosti, Russia’s most influential business newspaper, as well as ownership of The Moscow Times.
